name: ReactivateUser
description:
Reactivates a user in PROVISIONED or RECOVERY status.

Use this tool to reactivate a user who is in 'PROVISIONED' or 'RECOVERY' status. It restarts the activation workflow, providing either a direct reactivation via email or an activation link if email sending is disabled. The user may need to complete password reset and MFA enrollment to become 'ACTIVE'.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: An ID, login, or unambiguous shortname of an existing Okta user to be reactivated.

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

parameters.name: send_activation_email
parameters.description: Set to true to send an activation email to the user; false to generate an activation link.

value_schema.description: Sends an activation email to the user if `true`

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: sendEmail
parameters.description: Sends an activation email to the user if `true`

value_schema.description: Sends an activation email to the user if `true`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

value_schema.description: An ID, login, or login shortname (as long as the shortname is unambiguous) of an existing Okta user

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
